sentences.en: A blueprint shows where to put all the parts of the house.
sentences.cn: 蓝图告诉我们怎么处置房子的各部分.

sentences.en: All the machine parts on a blueprint must answer each other.
sentences.cn: 设计图上所有的机器部件都应互相配合.

sentences.en: By changing the tomato’s genetic blueprint , scientists can alter the rate at which it ripens.
sentences.cn: 科学家可以通过改变番茄的基因蓝图来改变它的成熟速度。

sentences.en: He hunted through the files till he found the blueprint.
sentences.cn: 他把档案翻了一遍,最后才找到图纸.

sentences.en: In my organization I've had blueprint developed for future.
sentences.cn: 在我的机构里,我有一张展望将来的蓝图.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, he can envisage a bright blueprint for himself.
sentences.cn: 同时他还能在逆境中为自己描绘美好的蓝图.

sentences.en: Such gifts are a natural part of the original human blueprint.
sentences.cn: 这些天赋是人类最初蓝图本质的一部份.

sentences.en: The blueprint has already been drawn for the development in the next five years.
sentences.cn: 国已经确定了今后五年的发展蓝图.

sentences.en: The construction of a music hall is still on the blueprint stage.
sentences.cn: 音乐厅的建造还在筹划的阶段.

sentences.en: The documents contain a blueprint for a nuclear device.
sentences.cn: 文件内附有一张核装置的设计蓝图。

sentences.en: The offspring contain a mixture of the genetic blueprint of each parent.
sentences.cn: 子女身上遗传了父母双方的基因型板。

sentences.en: There is a slight inaccuracy in this blueprint.
They are drawing the grand blueprint with their own hands.
sentences.cn: 他们用自己的双手描绘着宏伟的蓝图.

sentences.en: This is the rough draft of the blueprint and mustn't be lost.
sentences.cn: 这是图纸的底样,一定不能遗失.

sentences.en: We have provided the legislative blueprint for the Prime Minister.
sentences.cn: 我们为首相提供了立法蓝图.

sentences.en: While all our plans were still in the blueprint stage, our competitors got the jump on us by announcing their new model.
sentences.cn: 我们的全部设计还在蓝图阶段, 我们的对手已抢在我们之前预告了他们的新式样了.
